CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The external quantum efficiency ( EQE ) of the devices under the illumination of monochromatic light is shown in Figure 3.

Let's think step by step.

1. External quantum efficiency (EQE) - This is the material property or performance metric being discussed in the paragraph. It is a material name in the context of this paragraph as it refers to the efficiency of the devices under consideration.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The external quantum efficiency ( EQE ) of the devices under the illumination of monochromatic light is shown in Figure 3.

Let's think step by step.

1. External quantum efficiency (EQE) - This is the property name mentioned in the paragraph. It refers to the quantum efficiency of a device when it is operated under an external bias, as opposed to the internal quantum efficiency which measures the efficiency of a device when it is not biased. In this context, it is the efficiency of the device in converting external light into electrical current.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. External quantum efficiency (EQE) - This is the material property mentioned in the paragraph. It refers to the efficiency of a material or device in converting external light into electrical current.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The external quantum efficiency ( EQE ) of the devices under the illumination of monochromatic light is shown in Figure 3.

Let's think step by step.

1. External quantum efficiency (EQE) - This is the property value being discussed in the paragraph. It is a measure of the efficiency of a photovoltaic device in converting light energy into electrical energy under an external circuit.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

External quantum efficiency (EQE) - This is the material property value being discussed in the paragraph. It is a measure of the efficiency of a photovoltaic device in converting light energy into electrical energy under an external circuit.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".
